name: B. Inflation
statement:
You have a statistic of price changes for one product represented as an
array of n positive integers p_0, p_1,
dots, p_{n - 1}, where p_0 is the initial price of the product and p_i
is how the price was increased during the i-th month.Using these price
changes you are asked to calculate the inflation coefficients for each
month as the ratio of current price increase p_i to the price at the
start of this month (p_0 + p_1 +
dots + p_{i - 1}).Your boss said you clearly that the inflation
coefficients must not exceed k
